creator: Hinam Corner
descriptionHtml:
Khmer Keyboard is a great Khmer Typing app that allows you to type both in Khmer and English languages at the same time.

It is very easy to switch between Khmer & English languages in Khmer Keyboard.

Keyboard Khmer ks is a very easy-to-use, simply organized, user-friendly, and multi-language typing keyboard app. Using Khmer Unicode Keyboard you can type easily all your documents, emails, messages, posts on social media, and much more, in Khmer as well as English languages.

Khmer keyboard is a complete solution for typing English and Khmer at the same time. A non-Khmer person can also type the Khmer Language without any hesitation with this Keyboard Khmer ks.


Amazing features of Khmer Keyboard - Voice Typing:


✔️ Very easy to use Khmer Keyboard
✔️ Type Fast with this Trending Cambodia Keyboard.
✔️ Powerfull Translator: Translate your desired languages easily in 100+ different languages in a single click.
✔️ Dual Dictionary: Search any Khmer & English word you want to know about it.
✔️ Voice-to-Text: Type text using your voice.
✔️ Conversation Mode: Conversate with each other using 100+ different languages.
✔️ Hundreds of different and beautiful emojis, and emoticons to make your chats beautiful.
✔️ Beautiful Keyboard themes: Make your phone's keyboard look amazing with amazing Khmer Keyboard themes.
✔️ Customize keyboard settings according to your needs, like keypress sound, vibration on keypress, and many more.


How to use Khmer typing keyboard:
✔ First, go to the Play Store and download the Cambodia Voice Typing App.
✔ Open the app, first enable the keyboard.
✔ Select the keyboard as the default keyboard of your phone.
✔ Select your favorite theme from the theme section, and enjoy typing the Khmer language.


Privacy Policy:
This app is safe. Your Personal Information is 100% safe and secured with us. We don’t use or share any of your personal information like names, addresses, cc information, etc. So, you can download this Khmer keyboard. Check out our privacy policy for more information.


For more information, suggestions, or complaints, visit developers contact or mail us at intellectualappsvalley@gmail.com.
And if you like the app, please rate us 5 stars.
Thanks for visiting our app.
